com.facebook.buck.worker

Class WorkerProcessPoolSync

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.worker.WorkerProcessPoolSync
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkerProcessPool, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
public class WorkerProcessPoolSync
extends Object
implements Closeable, WorkerProcessPool
    A synchronous pool of WorkerProcess instances.

      static class  WorkerProcessPoolSync.BorrowedWorkerProcess
      Represents a WorkerProcess borrowed from a WorkerProcessPoolSync.

      • borrowWorkerProcess

        public WorkerProcessPoolSync.BorrowedWorkerProcess borrowWorkerProcess()
                                                                throws InterruptedException
        If there are available workers, returns one. Otherwise blocks until one becomes available and returns it. Borrowed worker processes must be relased by calling WorkerProcessPoolSync.BorrowedWorkerProcess.close() after using them.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
